perturbation.changed_text: A. AGI hereby grants a non-exclusive license (the "License") to the Company and its operating subsidiaries now or hereafter existing to use the Good Sam name and logo, including trademarks, trade names, or service marks as designated by AGI (the "Trademarks"), in connection with the sale of such new and used vehicles by the Company that have satisfied such criteria and standards as are established from time to time by AGI (the "Approved Use"). AGI makes no warranties regarding its right or ability to grant the License to the Company to use the Trademarks for the Approved Use in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, and the grant is made without assurance that such use will not infringe upon the rights of any other party. If the Company promptly notifies AGI in writing of a third party claim against the Company alleging that the Company's use of the Trademarks infringes a United States registered trademark, AGI will have no obligation to defend such claim.
perturbation.explanation: The original text warrants AGI's right to grant the license and provides indemnification for infringement claims. The modified text removes the warranty and eliminates AGI's obligation to defend infringement claims, creating a contradiction regarding the security and scope of the license granted to the Company.
